div.head: 實熱不通
div.div: repletion heat blocking the passage of stools

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: repletion heat blocking the passage of stools

sense.def: Pathological Condition of da bian mi 大便秘① , constipation, brought forth by body repletion with heat. Yi xue qi yuan 醫學啟源 Lj: 瀉諸實熱不通，下大便，蕩滌腸胃中熱 , “It drains all heat repletion blocking the passage [ of stools ]. It stimulates defecation. It purges the heat in the intestines and stomach”.
